text: Soni chisimu chene twatumisye ku nkutula uliose Ntenga (juwausalilaga) kuti: “Mun’galagatilani Allah ni kuwambalana najo shetani.” Basi wane mwa wanganyao pana wawajongwele Allah, ni pana wane mwa wanganyao wakwasimichiche pa wanganyao kusokonechela. Basi jendagani pa chilambo kupita nchilola mujawelele mbesi ja akukanila
